channel.title: death on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in death on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: In loving memory of Ashwini
item.description: This poem was written on July 4th 2011. I finally feel like it ok for the world to see this on her 4th death anniversary.

item.title: About Life and Death
item.description: From August 2008 We assume Immortality. Only a death of someone close to us reminds us of our Impermanence. We make promises and think of ways to make our lives more meaningful, now that we’ve experienced this reminder.

item.title: Eulogy
item.description: August 18th 2008 Who was Sripadrao Uncle? He was a Teacher. But if this is true, then the word ‘Teacher’ must absorb infinitely From his character, mind and actions.

item.title: Android body vs Human body
item.description: A lot of futuristic science fiction puts forward several ideas of what an android would be like. Data from Star Trek (TNG) is an intriguing character who tries very hard to understand what it is to be human.
